Body:
"""Ensure missing required fields causes an errors
        """
properties.pop(field)
v.validate(properties)
assert v.errors[field][0] == 'required field'
pytest.mark.parametrize('field', ['file-authors', 'chemked-version',
    'file-version', 'reference', 'experiment-type', 'apparatus', 'datapoints'])pytest.mark.parametrize('properties', ['testfile_required.yaml'], indirect=
    ['properties'])
